chapter.title: Dependency Tab
chapter.p: The Dependency Tab is the project's central location to manage dependencies. The counter next to the Dependency Tab indicates the number of NEW dependencies that have been raised against the project. The counter will remain next to the tab until there are no NEW dependencies to resolve.
You can view dependencies that your projects have raised on other projects as well as dependencies that have been raised on your own projects by switching the toggle highlighted below.

Beside the filtering of raising or resolving dependencies, you can also customize this tab with more information. By clicking on the "Add/Remove Columns" dropdown, you can select other dependency properties to display in the tab. Each column can also be sorted by ascending or descending order by clicking on the column header.

Lastly, to view hidden resolved dependencies, click on 'Load More'. The Dependency Tab will always show the 5 most recently updated dependencies. Clicking on 'Load More' will load the next 25 most recently updated dependencies and so forth.
